languages.text: "Помогать Адептус Арбитес — долг каждого подданного Империума. Я отвезу тебя на Даргонус как только смогу и захочу".
"Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."
languages.original_text: "Помогать Адептус Арбитес — долг каждого подданного Империума. Я отвезу тебя на Даргонус как только смогу и захочу".

traits.locale_text: "To assist the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus when circumstances permit."
"To assist the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus when circumstances permit."
"Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."
"Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."
"Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."
"Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."

languages.text: «Ayudar al Adeptus Arbites es el deber de todos los súbditos del Imperium. Le llevaré a Dargonus en cuanto las circunstancias me lo permitan».
languages.original_text: "Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: «Ayudar al Adeptus Arbites es el deber de todos los súbditos del Imperium. Le llevaré a Dargonus en cuanto las circunstancias me lo permitan».

languages.text: “协助法务部是每位帝国臣民应尽的职责。只要时机合适，我就会带你去达戈努斯。”
languages.original_text: "Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: “协助法务部是每位帝国臣民应尽的职责。只要时机合适，我就会带你去达戈努斯。”

languages.text: « Tous les sujets de l'Imperium ont le devoir d'assister l'Adeptus Arbites. Nous rallierons Dargonus dès que possible. »
languages.original_text: "Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les sujets de l'Imperium ont le devoir d'assister l'Adeptus Arbites. Nous rallierons Dargonus dès que possible. »

languages.text: 「アデプトゥス・アルビテスを支援することは、帝国の臣民の義務である。状況が許せば、すぐにでも君をダルゴナスに連れて行く」
languages.original_text: "Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: 「アデプトゥス・アルビテスを支援することは、帝国の臣民の義務である。状況が許せば、すぐにでも君をダルゴナスに連れて行く」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites'e yardımcı olmak, İmparatorluk tebaasının vazifesidir. Şartlar elverir vermez sizi Dargonus'a ulaştıracağım."
languages.original_text: "Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites'e yardımcı olmak, İmparatorluk tebaasının vazifesidir. Şartlar elverir vermez sizi Dargonus'a ulaştıracağım."

languages.text: "Die Unterstützung des Adeptus Arbites ist die Pflicht aller Diener des Imperiums. Ich bringe Euch nach Dargonus, sobald es die Umstände zulassen."
languages.original_text: "Assisting the Adeptus Arbites is the duty of every subject of the Imperium. I will take you to Dargonus as soon as circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: "Die Unterstützung des Adeptus Arbites ist die Pflicht aller Diener des Imperiums. Ich bringe Euch nach Dargonus, sobald es die Umstände zulassen."
